name: Ronald Binge
description:
'''Ronald Binge''' (15 July 1910 â€“ 6 September 1979) was a British composer and arranger of [[light music]]. He arranged many of [[Mantovani]]'s most famous pieces before composing his own music, which included ''[[Elizabethan Serenade]]'' and ''[[Sailing By]]''.
{{ external media|float=right|width=270px|audio1=You may hear Ronald Binge's ''[[Elizabethan Serenade]]'' as performed by [[Annunzio Mantovani]] and the Mantovani Orchestra in 1971  [https://archive.org/details/Mantovani_Orchestra_Greatest_01/08-elizabethanSerenade.wav '''Here on archive.org''']}}
